turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like to place an order at Peet's Coffee and tea.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order from peet's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a small caffè latte with no-fat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want your drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which peet's should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On Massachusetts Avenue in Lexington, Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. 1 small cafe latte with non fat milk from peet's on massechusetts avenue in lexington massechussets will be $4.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order. it'll b ready for pick up in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've also sent you the receipt via text. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care then! have a great day.
